潗字的基本解释

潗
jí
〔潗??（
〔湁（
n?）〕水沸腾声。ch?）潗〕见“湁”。

潗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jí］
［《廣韻》子入切，入緝，精。］
亦作“淁2”。
(1)泉水流出貌。参见“潗湁”、“潗濈”。
(2)象声词。参见“潗潗”。
(3)见“潗”。

潗字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潗； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页649第04
【廣韻】子入切【集韻】【韻會】卽入切，?音㗱。泉出也。一曰水瀵也。　又湁潗，水微轉細通貌。【司馬相如·上林賦】湁潗鼎沸。　又潗㵫，沸聲。【木華·海賦】㴿濘潗㵫。　又【集韻】七入切，音緝。義同。　或作唼緝。《石鼓文》作㴕。

考證：〔【木華·海賦】澒濘潗㵫。〕　謹照原文澒改㴿。
潗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
潗字的起名意思

形容水涌起的样子，也指水沸腾声。

Basic explanation of words
friendly

〔friendly??(
〔湁(
n?)] The sound of water boiling. ch?) 潗] See "湁".
friendly
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jí］
["Guangyun" sub-cutting, cutting-edge, fine. ]
Also known as "淁2".
(1) The appearance of spring water flowing out. See "潗湁", "潗濈".
(2) Onomatopoeia. See "潗潗".
(3) See "潗".
friendly
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潗; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 649 04
[Guang Yun] Sub-cutting [Jiyun] [Yunhui] 卽-cutting, ?音㗱. Izumi also. One said that the water is also.　 湁潗 again, the water turns slightly and the appearance is fine. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Happiness.　 潗㵫 again, boiling sound. 【Muhua·Haifu】㴿泞潗㵫.　[Jiyun] Seven cuts, sound. The same meaning.　Or be arrested. "Stone Drum Wen" was written 㴕. Textual research: [[Muhua·Haifu] 澒泞潗㵫. 〕　I would like to change it according to the original text.

Name meaning
To describe the appearance of water surging, it also refers to the sound of boiling water.
